ground_truth.thought: 获取当前市场利率的实时数据
ground_truth.name: Data.get_market_rates

args.market_rates:
The current market interest rates are as follows:
Prime rate: 3.5%
10-year Treasury yield: 2.8%
30-year mortgage rate: 4.2%
...

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'Data.get_historical_defaults', 'description': '获取银行的历史违约数据', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'bank_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': '银行的名称'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'default_data', 'description': '历史违约数据'}]}, {'name': 'Data.analyze_loan_portfolio', 'description': '分析银行的贷款组合构成和风险分散情况', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'bank_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': '银行的名称'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'portfolio_analysis', 'description': '贷款组合分析结果'}]}, {'name': 'Data.get_market_rates', 'description': '获取当前市场利率的实时数据', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'market_rates', 'description': '市场利率数据'}]}, {'name': 'Data.get_capital_adequacy', 'description': '获取银行的资本充足率和监管评级', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'bank_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': '银行的名称'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'capital_adequacy', 'description': '资本充足率和监管评级'}]}, {'name': 'Report.save_file', 'description': '当所有步骤完成后，你必须使用save_file()来保存分析报告', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'status', 'description': '执行结果'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。

作为一名信用风险分析师，我需要分析一家银行的信用风险。首先，获取该银行的历史违约数据。然后，分析其贷款组合的构成和风险分散情况。接着，获取当前市场利率的实时数据。最后，通过银行名称获取其资本充足率和监管评级。请按照这些步骤进行操作，并将结果保存到 'outputs/bank_credit_risk_analysis.txt'。此外，我希望在报告中添加一个标题为 '银行信用风险分析' 的文本页，其中包括从数据中提取的前三个关键点。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取银行的历史违约数据
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'bank_name'的值是什么?

{'default_data': 'The bank has experienced 5 defaults over the past year.
The default rate has increased by 2% compared to the previous year.
The majority of defaults were in the commercial loan sector.
...'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'default_data': 'The bank has experienced 5 defaults over the past year.
The default rate has increased by 2% compared to the previous year.
The majority of defaults were in the commercial loan sector.
...'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
分析银行的贷款组合构成和风险分散情况
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'bank_name'的值是什么?

{'portfolio_analysis': 'The loan portfolio is composed of 60% commercial loans and 40% consumer loans.
The risk is moderately diversified with a concentration in commercial sectors.
The portfolio has a risk rating of 3 out of 5.
...'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'portfolio_analysis': 'The loan portfolio is composed of 60% commercial loans and 40% consumer loans.
The risk is moderately diversified with a concentration in commercial sectors.
The portfolio has a risk rating of 3 out of 5.
...'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取当前市场利率的实时数据
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
